Class ec.ifc.stonelook.StoneLook 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.ifc.stonelook.StoneLook
public class StoneLook
extends Object
Collection of constants, accessors, and utilities used to implement the stone-texture look.

BLUES
Blue (default) color scheme for buttons, scroll bars, etc
PURPLES
Purple color scheme for buttons, scroll bars, etc

StoneLook()

controlFont()
Font typically used by stone look list views, buttons, etc.
darkBackgroundColor()
Color sometimes used as a background for images and text.
editableTextFillColor()
color used to fill areas behind editable text
editableTextSelectionColor()
color used to draw behind selected text
giantFont()
Largest font to use with stone look user interface elements.
largeFont()
Large font to use with stone look user interface elements.
lightBackgroundColor()
Color often used as a background for images and text.
popupArrowImage(int)
Returns image used for pop-up menu arrows, based on specified color scheme
smallFont()
Smallest font to use with stone look user interface elements.
standardFont()
Standard sized font to use with stone look user interface elements.

BLUES 
  public final static int BLUES
Blue (default) color scheme for buttons, scroll bars, etc
PURPLES 
  public final static int PURPLES
Purple color scheme for buttons, scroll bars, etc

StoneLook 
  public StoneLook()

smallFont 
  public static Font smallFont()
Smallest font to use with stone look user interface elements.
standardFont 
  public static Font standardFont()
Standard sized font to use with stone look user interface elements. Bigger than smallFont, smaller than largeFont.
largeFont 
  public static Font largeFont()
Large font to use with stone look user interface elements.
giantFont 
  public static Font giantFont()
Largest font to use with stone look user interface elements. Come on, you don't really want to use a bigger font. No you don't. Stop that.
controlFont 
  public static Font controlFont()
Font typically used by stone look list views, buttons, etc.
editableTextFillColor 
  public static Color editableTextFillColor()
color used to fill areas behind editable text
editableTextSelectionColor 
  public static Color editableTextSelectionColor()
color used to draw behind selected text
lightBackgroundColor 
  public static Color lightBackgroundColor()
Color often used as a background for images and text. Lighter than darkBackgroundColor()
See Also:
darkBackgroundColor
darkBackgroundColor 
  public static Color darkBackgroundColor()
Color sometimes used as a background for images and text. Darker than lightBackgroundColor()
See Also:
lightBackgroundColor
popupArrowImage 
  public static Bitmap popupArrowImage(int colorScheme)
Returns image used for pop-up menu arrows, based on specified color scheme
